Text: RE NewPower Cc Robert it has been a pleasure to work with you and each of the Enron representatives We have been impressed with the organization and its people David Original Message From Eickenroht Robert mailto Sent Friday October PM To Cc Derrick Jr James Muller Mark S Subject NewPower The BB Working Group Thank you for your help in closing the NewPower collateral substitution and for your advice along the way I know it was trying on all of us and I appreciate your professionalism hard work sacrifice and patience You all did a great job and please thank the other BB team members who supported us Hopefully we will have a reprieve before any more crises Thanks again and have a great weekend Robert This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

NPWMarcus Nettelton has confirmed that he has received the final document we were looking for from NPW and that he is distributing the Enron signatures to last nights documents The NPW news this morning reflects the new K

closing listDOC Cc closing listDOC Attached is a list of closing documents which I told Joe I would send We have copies of the necessary UCC search certificates in our office Lisa Mellencamp asks that you return the executed documents to our offices so that we may review them and coordinate execution by the Enron Parties The UCC filing statements need not be signed As to the changes requested in the Sager draft Lisa Robert and I agree that the language suggested for e of the Second Amendment was as stated only clarifying and need not be inserted in light of the balance of the text of the e and the statements made in your proposed K We understand that the other changes in the Sager draft were made in drafts subsequent to the one she was reviewing or are corrective only and will be made by you Thanks for all the hard work closing listDOC

RE Newpower Enron Agreements Cc Thanks This is the first we have seen of them Original Message From Eickenroht Robert mailto Sent Friday October PM To Buy Rick Bradford William S Tribolet Michael Nettelton Marcus Sager Elizabeth Cc Muller Mark Mellencamp Lisa Subject FW Newpower Enron Agreements In case you have not already received these documents attached are comments from NewPower Robert Original Message From Marc ewPowercom mailtoMarc ewPowercom Sent Friday October PM To Mellencamp Lisa Eickenroht Robert Subject Enron Agreements Enclosed are our comments We will call you shortly to discuss See attached file Copy of ndAmenddocRLdocSee attached file Copy of SecAgr RLdoc Thank you Marc Manly This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Amendment to Master Credit Agreement Cc Michael I want you to have one initial comment Joe Cialone talked with outside counsel for NPW who made the point that they did not understand why Enron needed collateral because NPW was hedged While that comment is is not logical the information on the hedges causes me to ask why Manley is so concerned with price movement if indeed NPW has its positions hedged Do we have information on NPWs book David
RE Amendment to Master Credit Agreement Cc It does thanks Have the NPW officers addressed with us a significant retrenchment and change of business plan
